name: Shift (itch) (RandomlySomeone)
description:
wasd to move, space to jump, mouse to change viewing directions -- just like other 3D games..

but you can switch the gravity according to the normal of the polygon you are standing on. Isn't that interesting?

I got this idea from a roblox game a few years ago and I'm not sure whether it's there now.. I will keep on developing.
